description: Got a chilly adventure planned? Go farther and stay warmer in their Men’s Intraknit™ Merino Insulated Jacket. The recycled wool insulation provides packable warmth, breathability, and insulation. Intraknit™ technology keeps you moving with ease and comfort, even through higher-intensity activities. And a knit-in DWR helps protect you from the elements, so you can take on some lower temps with no fuss.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Merino Insulated Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 47% Merino Wool, 37% Recycled Polyester, 13% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane
92% Recycled Merino Wool, 8% Polyester. Exclusive of Decoration
Insulation, articulation, and ventilation are seamlessly integrated to amplify movement and comfort
